text: Toto enywe mulinende eshilolelo eshilayi khu Ibrahim nende balia abali ninaye, Olwa baboolela Abandu babu mbu, efwe khuli ehale ninanyu nende biamulaamanga bilali Nyasaye, Khubakhayile ne obusuku nende ishinda buloleshe hakari wefu ninanyu okhuula shinga mulisuubila khu Nyasaye mulala, halali amakhuwa ka Ibrahim yaboolela samwana mbu: â€œNditsa ukhusabila eshileshelo, ne shendi nobunyali bwosi bwosi khu Nyasaye tawe, Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, newe butswa wakhwisichile, ne ni iwuwo butswa akhuliinjile, ne ni ewuwo butswa akhulikalukha
